author: Lin pardey
content: You can use PayPal under my account which is lpardey@xtra.co.nz. really appreciate all the sincere wishes people have sent. Really nice to be able to add to the Larry pardey memorial observatory.

author: Ginny Jones
content: For those of us who don’t do FaceBook or other social media, is there a way to give? Larry and Lyn Parden are world famous for their feats and their voyages. Thanks. V C Jones
